tafsir_name: Tafsīr Bayān as-saʿāda fī maqāmāt al-ʿibāda
al-Kaššāf ʿan ḥaqāʾiq ġawāmiḍ at-tanzīl wa-ʿuyūn al-aqāwīl fī wuǧūh at-taʾwīl

author_name: Muḥammad al-Amīn ibn Muḥammad al-Muḫtār ibn ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧakanī aš-Šanqīṭī
tafsir_name: Aḍwāʾ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-Qurʾān bi-l-Qurʾān
Ǧāmiʿ al-bayān ʿan taʾwīl āy al-Qurʾān
Ǧawāhir at-tafsīr: Anwār min bayān al-tanzīl

author_name: Mullā Muḥammad ibn Murtaḍā ibn Maḥmūd al-Kašānī
tafsir_name: aṣ-Ṣāfī fī tafsīr kalām Allāh al-wāfī

author_name: Abū Bakr Ǧābir ibn Mūsā ibn ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧazāʾirī

tafsir_name: al-Baḥr al-madīd fī tafsīr al-Qurʾān al-maǧīd

author_name: ʿIzz ad-Dīn Abū Muḥammad ʿAbd al-ʿAzīz ibn ʿAbd as-Salām
Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad Abū Isḥāq aṯ-Ṯaʿlabī
Abū Ḥafṣ ʿUmar ibn ʿAlī ibn ʿĀdil al-Dimašqī Nuʿmānī

tafsir_name: Tafsīr Bayān as-saʿāda fī maqāmāt al-ʿibāda
Ǧāmiʿ al-bayān ʿan taʾwīl āy al-Qurʾān
Aysar at-tafāsīr: tafsīr, asbāb nuzūl, aḥādīṯ, namāḏiǧ iʿrāb
